item.title: Thanxs runeagent
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Justin Bieber, post:12, topic:551737”]If nobody used tools like runeagent to act like a twat then the server owners would have no incentive to fix the bugs… or at least find a more secure base. I know 12 year old me wouldn’t have given a shit if someone came on my server and started telling me how to improve my code. If everyone starts spamming webs and trees then I’ll be looking for a new base straight away.[/quote]Definitely true in a lot of cases

Read full topic

item.title: Thanxs runeagent
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

If nobody used tools like runeagent to act like a twat then the server owners would have no incentive to fix the bugs… or at least find a more secure base. I know 12 year old me wouldn’t have given a shit if someone came on my server and started telling me how to improve my code. If everyone starts spamming webs and trees then I’ll be looking for a new base straight away.

item.title: Thanxs runeagent
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

telling someone they have a shit server without giving any hints at what exploits were used or how to fix them is not really grounds to say they deserve it or that they didnt “take it seriously”, unless there’s some other post for the server that you warned them in that I can’t see. again, i don’t really care if people do it, i just think it’s comical that its treated like it’s supposed to and is only used to help out server admins when it’s clearly being used for shits and giggles and public mockery; in the case of the quoted example looks like you did it to further shame a server after tree did one of his reviews on it

Read full topic

item.title: Thanxs runeagent
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:551737”]Yea, she only does it to help server owners fix their bugs. Always gives some in-depth explanations as to what the bugs are and how to fix them.

quality server

She wasn’t the one griefing servers by spamming things like interactable objects.

my video is still uploading but spamming webs sure is fun

http://youtu.be/oNt1j4qfXKY

RuneAgent Configuration:

snip

Webs script:

snip

And she would NEVER consider giving duped items away to the public. [quote=silabsoft]https://www.youtube.com/watch?t=87&v=l4JbsAZTbv4[/quote]

I mean I wont deny she did also help people, I just find it silly you’re white knighting and acting like it was all completely noble or that silab doesn’t find it awesome and hilarious when a server’s economy is rekt or people are trolled with things like the webs using her program. Which is fine, this is a cheating website. Just don’t be walking around with wool over your eyes ;P[/quote]

I’ve already stated how to fix those exploits multiple times, If server owners don’t take it seriously they deserve to have it happen. Go be salty elsewhere mr 2006scape

Read full topic

item.title: Thanxs runeagent
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:551737”]Yea, she only does it to help server owners fix their bugs. Always gives some in-depth explanations as to what the bugs are and how to fix them.

I mean I wont deny she did also help people, I just find it silly you’re white knighting and acting like it was all completely noble or that silab doesn’t find it awesome and hilarious when a server’s economy is rekt or people are trolled with things like the webs using her program. Which is fine, this is a cheating website. Just don’t be walking around with wool over your eyes ;P[/quote]
No no, I did admit that she did use the program for wrong doing, but she also provided people with a lot of insight they didn’t even think about in the first place.
I know I didn’t even think of a few packets that could be abused before I used the tool.

Read full topic

quality server[/quote]

http://youtu.be/oNt1j4qfXKY

RuneAgent Configuration:

snip

Webs script:

snip [/quote]

And she would NEVER consider giving duped items away to the public.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?t=87&v=l4JbsAZTbv4

I mean I wont deny she did also help people, I just find it silly you’re white knighting and acting like it was all completely noble or that silab doesn’t find it awesome and hilarious when a server’s economy is rekt or people are trolled with things like the webs using her program. Which is fine, this is a cheating website. Just don’t be walking around with wool over your eyes

item.title: Thanxs runeagent
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:551737”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670653.msg4484435#msg4484435 date=1433007403]
The point of runeagent actually isn’t to go on other servers and be a douche with it… (Just saying)
[/quote]Lol, you’re wrong. Silabsoft created it to go on servers and exploit bugs and do other general douchey things. If it was just to find bugs and help the owner fix them then why did she support and openly do things like just spam servers full of the webs and trees etc with the exploits. Yeah, she bragged about them publicly to expose it to the owner, but it wasn’t all done just to help.[/quote]
She didn’t really do that… I mean yes, she did on an occasion, but it wasn’t like she went to any 317 she could and gave herself admin and started spawning literally everything. Once the tool became available for download is when OTHERS started doing that… She would do exploits, but at the same time she also told everyone what the exploit was, including the server owners.
Did you not see her thread on it?
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662316.0.html

Private Server Exploits

Please do not release dupes with any of the tools provided simply tell the server administrators about the game logic flaw

Strange, it seems she wanted to help the owners, not hurt.

Read full topic

item.title: Thanxs runeagent
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:551737”]The point of runeagent actually isn’t to go on other servers and be a douche with it… (Just saying)[/quote]Lol, you’re wrong. Silabsoft created it to go on servers and exploit bugs and do other general douchey things. If it was just to find bugs and help the owner fix them then why did she support and openly do things like just spam servers full of the webs and trees etc with the exploits. Yeah, she bragged about them publicly to expose it to the owner, but it wasn’t all done just to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Thanxs runeagent

The point of runeagent actually isn’t to go on other servers and be a douche with it… (Just saying)
It’s a tool for owners to use to fix possible exploits in their servers.
